result.html: Bhí mise óg tráth freisinI was young once, too.

result.eng: I was there when I was young.

result.eng: Drugs are taken mostly by young people.

result.eng: They tried promoting the use of Irish among young people.
result.ga: Rinne siad iarracht úsáid na Gaeilge a chur chun cinn i measc daoine óga

result.html: Tá cuma na hóige airHe looks young.

result.eng: I was adopted when I was very young.

result.eng: Membership for students is two euros, and it is free for young children.
result.ga: Tá dhá euro ar bhallraíocht do mhic léinn agus tá sé saor in aisce do pháistí óga
result.orig: Tá dhá euro ar bhallraíocht do mhic léinn agus tá sé saor in aisce do pháistí óga

result.ponchtml: Tá ḋá euro ar ḃallraíoċt do ṁic léinn agus tá sé saor in aisce do ṗáistí ógaMembership for students is two euros, and it is free for young children.

result.eng: 'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ga: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.orig: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.html: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad ag teaċt faoinár ndéin liúiġ duine de na fir óga agus ḃí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.

result.eng: She left two young daughters behind when she came to Ireland.
result.ga: D'fhág sí beirt iníonacha óga ina diaidh nuair a tháinig sí go hÉirinn
result.orig: D'fhág sí beirt iníonacha óga ina diaidh nuair a tháinig sí go hÉirinn

result.ponchtml: D'ḟág sí beirt iníonaċa óga ina diaiḋ nuair a ṫáinig sí go hÉirinnShe left two young daughters behind when she came to Ireland.

result.eng: It was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.
result.ga: Níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighis
result.orig: Níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighis
result.html: Níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighisIt was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ aon ionaḋ gurḃ é an saol acadúil a ḃí i ndán don ḃuaċaill óg agus a ṁáṫair ina doċtúir leiġisIt was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.

result.eng: You can excuse Babaí, she is only a soft young thing of a child.
result.ga: Tá Babaí inleithscéil go fóill nó níl inti ach luspairt linbh
result.orig: Tá Babaí inleithscéil go fóill nó níl inti ach luspairt linbh

result.ponchtml: Tá Babaí inleiṫscéil go fóill nó níl inti aċ luspairt linḃYou can excuse Babaí, she is only a soft young thing of a child.

result.eng: It's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.
result.ga: Ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óige
result.orig: Ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óige
result.html: Ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óigeIt's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁór an truaiġe naċ ḃfuair mé foġlaim i m'óigeIt's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.

result.eng: They were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.
result.ga: Bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach Níorbh é sin do Shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gasta
result.orig: Bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach Níorbh é sin do Shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gasta
result.html: Bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach Níorbh é sin do Shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gastaThey were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostaċ Níorḃ é sin do Ṡéimí é ḃí sé óg lúfar gastaThey were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.

result.eng: If only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
result.ga: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith mé
result.orig: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith mé
result.html: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith méIf only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
result.ponchtml: Mo ċreaċ agus mo ċrá gan mé ċoṁ hóg leatsa inniu Ċaiṫfinn saol nár ċaiṫ méIf only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
